text:
After some investigations, TC4 behaves correctly.
It's a mistake in your server.xml/httpd.conf.
In httpd.conf you specified that the host name is "wando.charlestoncounty.org", while in server.xml this is called "localhost". Those two don't match, so when WARP tries to autodeploy the application for "wando.charlestoncounty.org" (the one configured in httpd.conf) it doesn't find the proper deployment path.
You can either change one of the two host names, or set the appBase property in the <Connector> tag, where the default "appBase" for all auto-configured hosts and paths is stored.
